overview: Tim Robinson is the co-founder and CEO of TimeView. Previously, Tim founded BioPay, the biometric payments company sold to Pay By Touch in 2006. He has extensive experience in biometric, credit card, debit card and check processing transactions. He founded CheckAGAIN, a business focused on recovering merchants’ returned checks via the ACH payment network; Credit-Link, Inc., a credit card sales organization; and Merchant-Link, a technical support business for restaurant point of sale equipment. Tim was also the owner and president of ArJay Data, the largest independent processor of SCAN check authorization transactions. He was a member of NACHA’s Electronic Check Council. Tim attended Georgetown University, while beginning his entrepreneurial career. Tim is a cyclist, sailor, kite-boarder and world traveller, who enjoys not waiting in line with his family at his local restaurants.
